channel.title: Azure Hybrid Benefit on This Is My Demo
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Hybrid Benefit on This Is My Demo

item.title: Windows Server 2025 vs Azure Local vs AVS Licensing Guide
item.description: Welcome Back to the Post-VMware Infrastructure Series If you’ve been following along with this series, you’ll remember our journey started with Rethinking Virtualization in a Post-VMware World, where we explored the seismic shifts in the virtualization landscape following Broadcom’s acquisition of VMware. The writing was on the wall: organizations needed alternatives, and they needed them fast. In our follow-up post, CapEx vs. Subscription TCO Modeling for Hyper-V, Azure Local, and AVS, we dove deep into the financial modeling that IT leaders desperately need to make informed decisions.
